title: Watching this guy play Overwatch
body:
http://www.twitch.tv/a_seagull
I was making fun of him for his stream title bragging about being a "top TF2 player" but watching him play is so hypnotizing. O__O Lucio prince of persias all over the fuckin place.

I wanted to play this game so badly, but now I know I'm never going to be this good.
